Material used.Description: Assessment of Parkin redistribution and LC3 localization on damaged mitochondria using mitochondrial uncoupler CCCP.

Readout description.Result Description: Parkin(C289G) failed to redistribute to damaged mitochondria, while HSJ1a/DNAJB6 restored mitophagy.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the literature.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the literature.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type Parkin was used as a positive control for normal mitophagy.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector or untreated cells served as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Not explicitly mentioned in the literature.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Successful redistribution of Parkin to damaged mitochondria with LC3 puncta formation.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Failure of Parkin redistribution and LC3 puncta formation.
